title: Shoutcaster looking for tips and further events :)
body:
Hi guys,

I posted not too long looking for further events too shoutcast, I have had some nice feedback from viewers and casters alike. So I guess I am looking for some people to critique my skills and help me further my shoutcasting career. I can possibly get VODs or even if you are interested in wanting to help me I can do a live if you are that way inclined. Hopefully I worded so it makes actual sense. I guess I could list what I've done.

* QUT/UQ Autumn Split
* QUT/UQ Finals
* ggLoL Fight Night friday
* Oceanic LoL various events
* ACL PRO shoutcaster "internship"(Sadly I was unable to take the chance due to the fact I am living in QLD.)
* Various other small events.


Thanks for taking the time to actually look at this post, you are awesome :)

replies.body: Would be super helpful if you posted some links to your previous work

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=miK36A7B,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-21T14:20:14.654+0000)
>
> Would be super helpful if you posted some links to your previous work

I'll see if I can find any, since some I have bookmarked have been removed by the owners of the channel. :(
